document_data.name: Spiders Plague
document_data.mainbody: The '''Spider Plagues''' referred to a devastating [[disease]] outbreak that struck ancient [[Calimshan]] in the {{YearlinkName|-599}}.
document_data.Effects: Victims of the Spider Plagues developed sores on their bodies which were filled with [[spider]] eggs. When these eggs hatched, they consumed the infected individual, killing them.
document_data.History: The Plagues impacted all cities in Calimshan and its territories in the surrounding region. The plague wiped out 32% of the general population, and 41% of [[Calimport]].
